reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, high quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the plastic installation mould, it ensures that the screen protector will be perfectly centered. Installation is fast, easy, and perfect. The glass is high quality and doesn't interfere with touch detection. You can barely tell it's there. I used it for years until it eventually cracked when I dropped my phone on the sidewalk, and it did its job perfectly--there was no damage at all to the iPhone itself, and I simply replaced the screen protector (there are 2 in the box!). Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best screen protector yet
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried countless tempered glass screen protectors through the years. This is by far the best one I have tried. The other ones are cheap and crack with every drop of your phone. But with this one, I’ve dropped my phone a good amount of times, and it’s still intact. There are no scratches or cracks anywhere!!! The plastic guide helped place the protector seamlessly & with no bubbles. I cannot recommend it enough. We’ve bought two packs of these and will continue to buy them for future phones if the quality remains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The One and Only Screen Protector You Really Need!
reviews.reviewText: Let's cut to the chase: the Spigen Glas.tR EZ Fit is honestly the best screen protector you can pair with your phone. It delivers exceptional edge-to-edge protection while maintaining high clarity for an uninterrupted viewing experience.The oleophobic coating is a blessing for anyone who despises fingerprints and smudges, keeping the screen looking clean and pristine. The screen protector feels great in the hands, mirroring the phone's natural touch response.Compatibility is a non-issue, as it fits perfectly with every single case I've tried. Plus, the installation process is not only easy but actually enjoyable, thanks to the innovative EZ Fit tray.For all the iPhone lovers out there, I can't recommend the Spigen Glas.tR EZ Fit enough. It truly is a game-changer in the world of screen protectors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, affordable and durable
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy it is is apply the screen protector and when done right, it adheres well without bubbles. They provide all the tools to clean, remove dust and apply the screen protector with the plastic guide/frame that you really can't go wrong as long as you follow the steps including cleaning your hands. This is my 2nd set as I've dropped my phone many times. The glass screen protector is durable and my screen has been protected from many falls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to apply!!
reviews.reviewText: I am really picky with my screen protectors I normally only buy Zach brand but I decided to take a chance and spend less money on something else. This one came with 2 screens and has the plastic guide to put it on the screen straight. I was able to get it on, completely straight and no bubbles!! So so happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars iphone 14pro nice fit
reviews.reviewText: I watched several youtube videos to decide on this brand for durability over others. Then I first made sure all the tips to correctly apply. Installation was exactly like videos and completed in minutes with care. I made sure to remove all dust first and removed all air bubbles after so there is a complete adhesion. It was a bit difficult to get the first layer to lift to peel away because the tiny corner tab would not separate from the actual protector. It was difficult to get a finger nail between the two layers and the actual protector kept trying to peeling up too. I noticed this in the video reviews also so be warned. The plastic frame perfectly lined up with my phone. After install the glass is very smooth and creamy feeling and glides swipes nice. The glass comes to the edge of my case and feels seamless. Only glitch is face recognition is not 100% now. About every 5th time I need to hold it right up to my face so there is a difference between iphone glass and having this protector glass. Also, occasionally it misses keystrokes too so i'm getting more auto correct errors when typing. This could be due to the extra smooth surface glide but it is noticeable from the previous month using iphone without the protector. I recommend this protector for overall ease of application and complete adhesion. I think the face recognition will be corrected by my redoing that on my iphone now. I think the extra glide will be nice and I'll get used to it. Overall this is a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest install ever
reviews.reviewText: Feels great, installs great, and is cheap! Some are $40! This comes with 2 and an alignment tool. Never again will I install one without an alignment tool. I have installed spigen protectors on my Steamdeck, ipad pro and iphone 14 pro. Easy and perfectly aligned every single time. Without it, my past protectors have always bugged me or been misaligned somehow.

As someone who's had their fair share of smartphone mishaps, I understand the importance of a reliable screen protector. Enter the Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector [GlasTR EZ FIT] for iPhone 14 Pro, a product that promises not only to protect your device but to make the installation process as hassle-free as possible. Here's my take on it.Installation: The EZ FIT installation kit is a game-changer. Spigen has ingeniously solved the most daunting aspect of screen protector application - alignment. The kit includes a frame that you place over your iPhone, ensuring the protector aligns perfectly with your screen every time. The process is so straightforward and bubble-free, it almost feels like magic. For someone who lacks the steady hands of a surgeon, this feature alone makes the GlasTR EZ FIT worth it.Protection: Made from high-quality tempered glass, the screen protector feels sturdy yet surprisingly thin. It doesn't add noticeable bulk to the phone, maintaining the sleek profile of the iPhone 14 Pro. The glass claims to have a 9H hardness rating, and while I haven't gone out of my way to test this claim by dropping my phone, it has survived everyday knocks and bumps without a scratch.Clarity and Sensitivity: One of my biggest gripes with screen protectors in the past has been how they can dull the display or reduce touch sensitivity. This is not the case with the GlasTR EZ FIT. My iPhone's display remains as vibrant and crisp as ever, and touch sensitivity is unaffected. It's as if the protector isn't there, which is precisely what you want.Case Compatibility: The "Case Friendly" design is not just a marketing gimmick. I've paired it with a Spigen case, and the synergy between the two is perfect. There's enough edge space to ensure the case doesn't lift the protector, a common issue with lesser screen protectors.Value: While the GlasTR EZ FIT is priced slightly higher than some competitors, the combination of easy installation, effective protection, and flawless compatibility with cases justifies the cost. It's an investment in peace of mind, knowing your phone's screen is safeguarded against everyday hazards.Final Thoughts: The Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector [GlasTR EZ FIT] for iPhone 14 Pro is a top-tier product that delivers on its promises. It's a perfect blend of protection, functionality, and user-friendliness. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or someone who simply wants to keep their iPhone safe, this screen protector is a wise choice. Highly recommended.
Más que excelente, fácil de poner, muy agradable al tacto no sientes diferencia con la pantalla y compatible con todas las fundas que he utilizado.
Muito fácil de colocar, vem com manuais de instrução, video e acessórios para ficar ainda melhor na sua tela. Vale muito a pena!

L’applicazione è stata incredibilmente semplice grazie al design EZ Fit, senza bolle o fastidi. La durezza del vetro temperato offre una protezione affidabile dagli urti e dai graffi senza compromettere la chiarezza dello schermo. La sensibilità del touchscreen rimane intatta, garantendo un’esperienza utente senza compromessi. Consiglio vivamente il vetro temperato Spigen Glas.tR EZ Fit per una protezione impeccabile.”
